```{r}
types = c()

types = append("oases", types)
types = append("trinity", types)

p = 0.05
lfc = 0.1

comparisons = c()

comparisons = append(comparisons, "TwovsFour")
comparisons = append(comparisons, "TwovsSix")
comparisons = append(comparisons, "TwovsEight")
comparisons = append(comparisons, "FourvsSix")
comparisons = append(comparisons, "FourvsEight")
comparisons = append(comparisons, "SixvsEight")

directions = c()

directions = append(directions, "DE")
directions = append(directions, "UP")
directions = append(directions, "DOWN")

for(type in types){
  info = read.csv(paste0("C:\\Users\\Arie\\Documents\\MLML_Class_Materials\\Logan_Lab\\Thesis_data\\annotation\\sw_Zuri_", type, "_kegg_info.csv"))
  for(comparison in comparisons){
    for(direction in directions){
      de_list = paste0("C:\\Users\\Arie\\Documents\\MLML_Class_Materials\\Logan_Lab\\Thesis_data\\data_analysis\\DE_lists\\Zuri_", type, "_", comparison, "_P", p, "C", lfc, "_", direction, ".csv")
      de = read.csv(de_list)
      
      temp = merge(info[,c("accession_id", "gene_name", "protein_name", "go.biological_process.", "go.molecular_function.", "go.cellular_component.")], de, by.x = "accession_id", by.y = "X")
      rownames(temp) = temp$accession_id
      temp = temp[,-1]
      write.csv(temp, de_list)
    }
  }
  
  
  
}
```
